home.title: Document Positions
home.createOrEditLabel: Create or edit a Document Position

documentPosition.created: A new Document Position is created with identifier {{ param }}
documentPosition.updated: A Document Position is updated with identifier {{ param }}
documentPosition.deleted: A Document Position is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Document Position {{ id }}?

documentPosition.name: Name

help.type: position type; possible values: N - normal, T - text, PB - page break, H - header, SI - subtotal (incremental), SNI - subtotal (non incremental)
help.catalogType: position catalog type; possible values: P - product, S - service
help.name: position name
help.price: price per unit; required for N type
help.vat: VAT rate; required for N type
help.discountType: optional discount type; possible values:A - amount, P - percentage
help.showOnlyTotal: whether to show only total on invoice
